CustomObject.description: Contains a list of configuration settings in use by billing account creation process. Billing account requests are generated in Salesforce and sent to billing account master system (AusPost - SAP, StarTrack - TEAM) to provision the billing account. Once provisioned, billing accounts master notify Salesforce by publishing platform event - BillingAccountCreationEvent__e. Currently only used by StarTrack billing account integration with TEAM.
CustomObject.label: Billing Account Creation Configuration
